data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Honghe Hani and Yi.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Honghe Hani and Yi, Yunnan, China

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Honghe Hani and Yi, Yunnan, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Honghe Hani and Yi, Yunnan, China so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Honghe Hani and Yi, Yunnan, China today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Phala people. 0.3% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, fill the 94,455 believers in the county of Honghe Hani and Yi with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Honghe Hani and Yi that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.focus_label: Honghe Hani and Yi, Yunnan, China

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Honghe Hani and Yi, Yunnan, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
